title: Resolution regarding the bot command ban in #general
description: Prohibits certain commands and allows the rest of @Secretary of State commands to be used in #general.
content:
**A RESOLUTION**
*of the Congress of the Bayer Free State*

__RESOLVED__ that:
1. All commands from the Economy, Generator, Calculator, Data categories of @Secretary of State#4438 shall be blocked from being used in #general .
2. Apart from the commands mentioned in section 1, all commands of @Secretary of State#4438 shall now be allowed to be used again in #general .
